类的使用
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.MiniBatchOperationInProgress

  • 使用MiniBatchOperationInProgress的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.coprocessor
    Table of Contents Overview Coprocessor RegionObserver Endpoint Coprocessor loading Overview Coprocessors are code that runs in-process on each region server.
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver  

    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.coprocessor中MiniBatchOperationInProgress的使用

      参数类型为MiniBatchOperationInProgress的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.coprocessor中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      default void RegionObserver.postBatchMutate(ObserverContext<RegionCoprocessorEnvironment> c, MiniBatchOperationInProgress<Mutation> miniBatchOp)
      This will be called after applying a batch of Mutations on a region.
      default void RegionObserver.postBatchMutateIndispensably(ObserverContext<RegionCoprocessorEnvironment> ctx, MiniBatchOperationInProgress<Mutation> miniBatchOp, boolean success)
      Called after the completion of batch put/delete and will be called even if the batch operation fails.
      default void RegionObserver.preBatchMutate(ObserverContext<RegionCoprocessorEnvironment> c, MiniBatchOperationInProgress<Mutation> miniBatchOp)
      This will be called for every batch mutation operation happening at the server.
